tips: The mana loss reduction does not only work for mana cost of spells, it affects any form of mana loss not caused by losing intelligence.
attrs: Bonus +16 Agility +16 Intelligence +16 Attack speed +12% Spell damage +16% Mana loss reduction +30 Movement speed
info: For strength heroes, it grants 2.56 armor, 32 attack speed, 0.8% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 13.12% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 2.56 armor, 32 attack speed, 0.8% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 13.12% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 2.56 armor, 32 attack speed, 0.8% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 13.12% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple Yasha-based items ( Yasha, Sange and Yasha, Yasha and Kaya, Manta Style, Trident) do not stack.
Mana loss reduction and spell damage amplification from multiple Kaya-based items ( Kaya, Kaya and Sange, Yasha and Kaya, Bloodstone, Trident) do not stack.
Stacks additively with other sources of mana loss reduction.
